item.title: ‘Rock & Roll’ is dead
item.author: Duncan R Casey,Peter Roberts,
item.description: Black Rebel Motorcycle Club Brixton Academy December 2010 Duncan Casey It turns out that the BRMC have been turning out their brand of stripped-down garage rock, more reminiscent of the New York scene than that of their native California, for a decade now. They’re one of those bands that you’ll …
